name: jsreact
author: Patrolin
description: A reimplementation of React that doesn't allow multiple rerenders per frame.

scripts.build-windows: powershell rm dist/*; npx tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && powershell cp src/*.d.ts dist
scripts.build-linux: rm dist/*; npx tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && cp src/*.d.ts dist
